name: Zirconion, Shield of Ultimate Defense
data: It increases the users dexterity pathetically.
It has nice armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
It modifies the user's resistance to cold damage.
It modifies the user's resistance to electric damage.
It affects the user's skill knowledge.
